memory: To complete the task, I should have dropped the green key before attempting to pick up the box, as it was unnecessary to carry it. My new plan is to go back to the location where I dropped the green key, pick it up, then drop it again to free my hands. Then, I will proceed to pick up the box to complete the mission.

To complete the mission, I should have focused on clearing the path to the green door and box, instead of getting stuck at the wall. I should have dropped the blue ball earlier to avoid carrying it unnecessarily. A better plan would be to drop the blue ball, go around the wall, and then pick up the box.
